title: test776: NTLM test flaky in valgrind tests
body:
### I did this

Observing frequent fails in valgrind jobs for test:
```
FAIL 776: 'HTTP with NTLM with too long NTMLv2 ntresplen' HTTP, HTTP GET, HTTP NTLM auth, NTLM
```

It's not a valgrind failure as far as I can tell, it rather looks like a timing
issue, triggered by the slower valgrind runs?

CM openssl -O3 libssh valgrind:
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18785192719/job/53601530909?pr=16973 (PR)

CM openssl libssh2 sync-resolver valgrind:
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18791108468/job/53621362571 (PR)
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18792496014/job/53625818593 (PR)
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18752351198/job/53495134854 (master)
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18761679468/job/53527553532 (master)

CM libressl krb5 valgrind:
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18791922414/job/53624025818 (PR)
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18776664983/job/53572801152 (master)
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18778617240/job/53578948912 (master)
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/18742146806/job/53635062486 (master a7ece53e96baa014911f4f4a757b78559f91d19d)

Seen first after this commit on master:
https://github.com/curl/curl/commit/3ac38a6b80e16f5885e629b35cb5a36a006ea8a5

This commit happens to touch MD4, which is exclusively used for NTLM.
But, it only cuts out dead mbedTLS code (guarded by `MBEDTLS_MD4_C`
which is never defined in v3+). While the failures happen in OpenSSL/LibreSSL
jobs.

This earlier commit added test 776, and possibly related:
a7ece53e96baa014911f4f4a757b78559f91d19d


### I expected the following

776 to pass reliably with valgrind.


### curl/libcurl version

latest master


### operating system

Linux
